channel.title: Jesse Duplantis Ministries Presents: Glorious Living with Cathy Video Podcast
channel.description: JDM's weekly Glorious Living with Cathy video content in a mobile-friendly format. On the go or at home, JDM is about reaching people and changing lives, one soul at a time.

item.title: Glorious Living with Cathy: Looking Forward to Glorious 2026!!!
item.dc:creator: Cathy Duplantis
item.description:
Are you EXCITED for GLORIOUS 2026?! Enjoy this fun, faith-filled program with Cathy and Chrissy as they discuss the upcoming Glorious conference. Register today! (https://jdm.org/registration/glorious).

 

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis 
*Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

Ways to Give: PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/jdmgiving
Website: https://www.jdm.org/donate
Text to Give: https://www.jdm.org/w-JDMTextToGive

Join TotalJDM now and get access to years of messages by Jesse and Cathy Duplantis for free!

*TotalJDM: https://total.jdm.org/

 

© 2026 Rev. Catherine C. Duplantis

item.title: Glorious Living with Cathy: Achieve Financial Freedom God’s Way
item.dc:creator: Cathy Duplantis
item.description:
Join Cathy, Chrissy, and Pastor Ron Fortune as they discuss how the new Covenant Church Sunday morning classes are transforming the way people view their finances!Watch and be blessed as Pastor Ron shares his testimony of how the Lord rescued him from poverty and placed him into a life of abundance.

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

Website: https://www.jdm.org/donate
Text to Give: https://www.jdm.org/w-JDMTextToGive

*TotalJDM: https://total.jdm.org/

item.title: Glorious Living with Cathy: Teamwork Makes The GLORIOUS Dream Work!
item.dc:creator: Cathy Duplantis
item.description:
Cathy Duplantis’ 2025 Glorious a Conference for Women is coming up SOON! Join Cathy, Chrissy, and their special guests, Christine Bartley and Mary Holton in Studio C. Be encouraged to come and experience GLORIOUS 2025 for yourself and be blessed!

 

Glorious 2025 takes place Friday, March 7th at 7pm and Saturday, March 8th at 9am and 7pm.

Everyone is welcome and registration is FREE. Children’s ministry is provided! Register here (https://jdm.org/product/352/glorious-a-conference-for-women).

 

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis 
*Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

Ways to Give: PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/jdmgiving
Website: https://www.jdm.org/donate

item.dc:creator: Cathy Duplantis
item.description:

item.title: Glorious Living with Cathy: Live A Glorious Life Of Forgiveness!
item.dc:creator: Cathy Duplantis
item.description:
Jesse, the Apostle of Joy, is in studio C with Cathy and Chrissy! Unforgiveness will shut down a lot of things in our life—spiritually, physically, and financially. But when we understand that our record has been expunged by the powerful blood of Jesus, we can find joy and forgiveness!

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

item.title: Glorious Living With Cathy: The Healing Power of JOY!
item.dc:creator: Cathy Duplantis
item.description:
It’s a victorious celebration of joy in Christ! Cathy, Chrissy, and their guest, Jessica Berthelot, are proclaiming victory over depression, fear, anxiety, and giving God praise for glorious joy! Through her insight as a nurse, Jessica tells her own glorious story of how she found physical healing with a supernatural dose of joy.

item.dc:creator: Cathy Duplantis
item.description:
It’s back to school in Studio C! Join Cathy as she sits with Chrissy and her lovely sister, Cheree Gomez, author, former principal, and now, homeschool Mom! item.title: Glorious Living With Cathy: Igniting Vision Within Your Kids
item.dc:creator: Cathy Duplantis
item.description:
It’s an exciting day in Studio C as Cathy and Chrissy welcome Melissa Berthelot, the Covenant Church Children’s Pastor. Listen in and recognize the importance of God-given vision in the lives of children and learn practical steps to help fan that flame of faith. 

 So if you’re 1 or 101, you’re still God’s kid, and He has a glorious vision for you, too!
